--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Torca:::
> 
> ::He walked up to where the others are standing.  he looks at 
Redhot.  
> Although he looked like a Decepticon, he had an Autobot symbol::
> Torca: Hey, buddy, don't mind me asking, but why do you look like a 
> Decepticon seeker?

::REDHOT::

    Redhot eyed his new companions suspitiously. He quietly digested 
the words Beachcomber had said about Cliffjumper. 
    (If his words ARE true) the seeker thought, (I best let him 
adjust. I AM a bit of a surprise.)
    He watched Klant and Torca approach. His eyes were calm and soul 
searching. A broad grin greeted Torca when he spoke.
    "I look... like a seeker... b...because Starscream ...is my 
brother. It's... a family... thing." He attempted to get to his feet 
again. "As I said...I ...once..was a Decepticon."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
